Sentencas: Different sets of perovskite-type oxides of general formula Pr0.8Sr0.2Co1-xFexO3-delta (x = 0.0, 0.2, 0.5, 0.8 and 1.0) were successfully prepared by low-cost single-step combustion synthesis at low temperatures based on the auto-ignition reaction of a nitrate solution in the presence of citric acid.
Titulo: Nano-sized Pr0.8Sr0.2Co1-xFexO3 powders prepared by single-step combustion synthesis for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Thermogravimetric and differential thermal analysis was carried out on nitrate-citrate precursors to determine the perovskite-phase formation process.
Titulo: Nano-sized Pr0.8Sr0.2Co1-xFexO3 powders prepared by single-step combustion synthesis for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: The results revealed that the nitrate-citrate precursor exhibited self-propagating combustion behavior.
Titulo: Nano-sized Pr0.8Sr0.2Co1-xFexO3 powders prepared by single-step combustion synthesis for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Pr0.8Sr0.2Co1-xFexO3-delta powders showed an orthorhombic single-phase, with their unit cell volume increasing as a function of the Fe content (x).
Titulo: Nano-sized Pr0.8Sr0.2Co1-xFexO3 powders prepared by single-step combustion synthesis for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy observations showed that the prepared powders were nanocrystalline.
Titulo: Nano-sized Pr0.8Sr0.2Co1-xFexO3 powders prepared by single-step combustion synthesis for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes

Sentencas: The Pr0.8Sr0.2Co1-xFexO3-delta powders were characterized as fuel cell electrodes on Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-delta pellets in symmetrical cells, and the electrochemical properties of the electrode/electrolyte interfaces were investigated using electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) as a function of the temperature, Fe content (x) and oxygen partial pressure.
Titulo: Nano-sized Pr0.8Sr0.2Co1-xFexO3 powders prepared by single-step combustion synthesis for solid oxide fuel cell cathodes
